value.title: Wearable 'Ai Pin' Launched by Humane, Backed by Ex-Apple Execs and Microsoft
value.excerpt: The Ai Pin, as the device is called, is designed to be worn on clothing and can be tapped to talk to a virtual assistant powered by technologies from ChatGPT-creator OpenAI and cloud computing power from Microsoft. It uses a laser projection system to display text and monochromatic images on a user's hand.
